verses.roman:
sarva-deśa-kāla-daśāya janera kartavya
guru-pāśe sei bhakti praṣṭavya, śrotavya

synonyms: sarva—all; deśa—countries; kāla—times; daśāya—and in circumstances; janera—of every man; kartavya—the duty; guru-pāśe—in the care of a spiritual master; sei—that; bhakti—devotional service; praṣṭavya—to be inquired; śrotavya—and to be heard.
translation: " 'It is therefore the duty of every man-in every country, in every circumstance and at all times-to approach the bona fide spiritual master, question him about devotional service and listen to him explain the process.
